GSD.description:
netlink: Bounds-check struct nlmsgerr creation

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.10 by commit aff4eb16f589c3af322a2582044bca365381fcd6. For more details please see the references link.
